definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_random_patch" inline="false"><field name="tries">10</field><field name="xzSpread">7</field><field name="ySpread">3</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to place up to 10 cactus columns</comment><value name="feature"><block type="placed_feature_inline"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We use the extra placement to make sure that the cacti only generate in valid spots</comment><value name="feature"><block type="feature_block_column_simple" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This represents a single cactus column</comment><value name="height"><block type="int_provider_biased_to_bottom"><field name="min">1</field><field name="max">3</field></block></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Magmactus</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="placement"><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We check if each column is at a valid place</comment><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_all_of"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_would_survive"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.CACTUS</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">6</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is so the patch only generates in some of the chunks. The higher the value, the rarer the patch will be</comment><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="165">We then move the patches at the highest motion blocking block, so that they generate on the surface</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
